long_description: Decked out with warm insulation, handy pockets and subtle style, the waterproof women's 686 Mannual Tender insulated jacket makes your day on the slopes carefree and tons of fun. INFIDRY-10(TM) breathable waterproof coating complements 100g polyester insulation in the body to deliver premium weather protection and warmth in the winter. Hood and sleeves have 60g insulation for a balance of warmth and good range of movement. Fully taped seams ensure water doesn't make its way inside. Flip the hood up and pull on the drawcord keep snow and wind from getting in. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. Pit zippers let you vent body heat quickly. Zippered hand pockets and zippered chest pockets keep all your essentials close at hand. 686 Mannual Tender insulated jacket is rated to keep you warm from about -5degF to 32degF. Street Fit cut is slim but not too slim.
short_description: Decked out with warm insulation, handy pockets and subtle style, the waterproof women's 686 Mannual Tender insulated jacket makes your day on the slopes carefree and tons of fun.
